Text.Page:
Are you finding your feet in Arborea?

You’ll have to train hard to get used to your new surroundings quickly.

Do you want me to give you some training? "What have I got to do?"

Excellent. If you use {@WorkObject:250001}, you’ll need to defeat the Shadow Warrior that appears. But it’s just a warm-up exercise.

You can come to me for training any time.
